page.title: 13BMX TRACKS IN BIRSTALL
page.content: BMX is a fast growing sport all over the country. This involves racing or performing stunts on a bike that has small wheels and a special frame. For safety you are advised to wear a crash helmet, knee and elbow pads, gloves and suitable footwear e.g. trainers. Many children attempt stunts and races in the streets using the kerbs to help with the tricks. A local video shop owner took a suggestion from the children to the Parish Council for a safe BMX track to be built. They decided that it could be sited at the Meadow Lane Playing fields. The Birstall Action Team built it using mounds of soil, which were accidentally left on the football pitch, and old tyres from a local garage. It was finished in July, but it is on the other side of the A6 from where I live!
